analysis: The project is a website focused on black holes with a theme that includes animated objects, slides, and pages. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the website. The CSS file needs to be updated to include a full dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The JavaScript file needs to be updated with improved mobile menu toggle functionality and event listeners for new buttons. The HTML file needs to be completed to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
